workLog.result: Activated Serena, read HANDOFF.md, usage-mandatory, foundational-knowledge-index, verified branch
Fetched Lindy Effect, Second-System Effect, Path Dependence from Wikipedia and authoritative sources
Fetched Sociotechnical Coherence, Run vs Change, Compliance as Code, Data Lineage
Fetched Strangler Fig, Expand/Contract, Sacrificial Architecture from Martin Fowler
Fetched Three Horizons Framework from McKinsey and strategic sources
Fetched TOGAF, Technical Ethics, Digital Transformation, Knowledge Continuity

decisions.decision: Create dedicated index memory for distinguished engineer content
decisions.rationale: Keeps foundational-knowledge-index manageable while allowing deep-dive into 25+ year concepts

learnings: Lindy Effect suggests battle-tested technologies have better survival odds than novel ones
Second-System Effect warns against overcomplicating rewrites of successful systems
Three Horizons Framework provides investment allocation guidance (70/20/10)
Shearing layers concept applies to software: different components change at different rates
Distinguished engineers focus on systems they do not touch and teams they do not lead
